titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious letter to the Parliament. [sic] of Scotland
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at our court at Loo the 28 August 1696. and of our reign the eighth year.
Appointing John, Earl of Tullibardine, Commissioner for the session of Parliament.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
